heading.title: Featured Work
heading.description: A selection of WordPress projects that highlight our approach to performance, stability, and clean engineering. Each project reflects the level of technical depth and reliability we bring to client partnerships.

projects.title: Fairagora Asia
projects.summary: Complete WordPress rebuild with improved UX, structured content hierarchy, and performance-focused architecture.
projects.technicalFocus: Custom theme, multilingual SEO configuration, schema setup, caching improvements, accessibility corrections.
results: Page load time improved from 3.9 seconds to 1.4 seconds
Organic visibility increased by 36 percent over 90 days
Admin workflow time reduced by 40 percent due to CMS restructuring

projects.title: LogicMark
projects.summary: Modernised WordPress platform aligned with updated brand requirements and streamlined navigation.
projects.technicalFocus: Accessibility improvements, mobile responsiveness upgrades, technical SEO corrections.
results: Clearer content paths for key product pages

projects.title: NNFCC
projects.summary: Long-term WordPress maintenance, code cleanup, plugin rationalisation, and improved content management workflows.
projects.technicalFocus: Security hardening, reduced plugin footprint, backend optimisation.
results: Improved CMS efficiency for internal content teams

projects.title: HealthPro Clinic Portal
projects.summary: HIPAA-ready WordPress site with online appointment scheduling and secure patient resource access.
projects.technicalFocus: HIPAA compliance, secure patient portal, appointment booking system.
results: Administrative hours reduced by approximately 15 hours per month
Appointment booking conversions increased by 19 percent
Added custom security layer for protected pages

projects.title: RetailMax E-commerce Store
projects.summary: Custom WooCommerce implementation with subscription support, refined product search, and optimised checkout flow.
projects.technicalFocus: Custom WooCommerce development, subscription management, checkout optimization.
results: Average order value increased by 11 percent
Page load times improved from 4.1 seconds to 1.7 seconds

projects.title: TechNova SaaS Marketing Site
projects.summary: Performance-optimised WordPress site built for rapid indexing, lightweight code, and strong marketing conversion paths.
projects.technicalFocus: Performance optimization, SEO-focused architecture, conversion optimization.
results: Demo sign-ups increased by 40 percent within 60 days
Blog performance improved with caching and code refinement

heading.title: Featured Shopify Work
heading.description: Shopify Stores Built for Scale, Performance, and Brand Impact

shopify_development.subheading: We have delivered Shopify stores for globally recognised brands and fast-growing eCommerce businesses across fashion, lifestyle, sustainability, consumer goods, and high-consideration retail. Our work includes full Shopify builds, brand-led redesigns, Shopify Plus implementations, performance optimisation, and conversion-focused enhancements.

projects.title: XOG
projects.scope: Brand development, UX and UI design, custom Shopify build
projects.summary: End-to-end Shopify delivery from brand direction to storefront build, focused on product presentation and conversion clarity.
projects.outcome: A distinctive brand-led Shopify store with a clean buyer journey and scalable structure.

projects.title: Allbirds
projects.scope: Shopify development, performance optimisation, scalable storefront architecture
projects.summary: Shopify build focused on speed, sustainability storytelling, and global-ready performance for a high-volume footwear brand.
projects.outcome: Optimised storefront performance and streamlined user journeys for international traffic.

projects.title: Matalan
projects.scope: Shopify eCommerce development, catalogue structuring, UX optimisation
projects.summary: Shopify implementation supporting large catalogues, seasonal campaigns, and conversion-led navigation.
projects.outcome: Improved product discoverability and smoother purchase paths for high-volume traffic.

projects.title: Stitch Fix
projects.scope: Shopify development, custom workflows, integration support
projects.summary: Shopify build supporting subscription commerce flows and scalable operational logic.
projects.outcome: Platform stability and UX consistency across recurring customer journeys.

projects.title: Chubbies Shorts
projects.scope: Shopify theme development, brand-led UX, checkout optimisation
projects.summary: Custom Shopify experience aligned with brand tone and conversion-driven design.
projects.outcome: Improved mobile shopping experience and checkout clarity.

projects.title: Dryrobe
projects.scope: Shopify development, international storefront readiness, performance optimisation
projects.summary: Shopify store built to support content-heavy product pages and seasonal demand spikes.
projects.outcome: Reliable performance during peak traffic periods.

projects.title: Kith
projects.scope: Shopify Plus development, high-traffic handling, product drop readiness
projects.summary: Shopify build supporting premium brand presentation and high concurrency during campaigns.
projects.outcome: Stable storefront performance during launch and drop activity.

projects.title: Leif Shop
projects.scope: Shopify design and development, editorial layouts, UX refinement
projects.summary: Design-led Shopify store blending editorial storytelling with conversion best practices.

projects.title: Silk and Willow
projects.scope: Shopify development, custom theme design, SEO-friendly structure
projects.summary: Shopify store designed to showcase curated sustainable products with clarity and elegance.
projects.outcome: Improved browsing experience and stronger organic structure.

projects.title: Cowboy
projects.scope: Shopify development, platform integration support, UX optimisation
projects.summary: Shopify storefront supporting a connected hardware brand with clear product education and clean UI.
projects.outcome: Simplified buying journey for high-consideration products.

projects.title: Pure Cycles
projects.scope: Shopify development, catalogue optimisation, product comparison UX
projects.summary: Shopify store built to support complex product ranges and comparison-led purchasing decisions.
projects.outcome: Clearer navigation and improved buyer confidence.

projects.title: Christy Dawn
projects.scope: Shopify development, content-led commerce, brand storytelling
projects.summary: Shopify platform supporting ethical product storytelling alongside conversion-focused layout.
projects.outcome: Strong alignment between brand values and purchase journey.

projects.title: HELM Boots
projects.scope: Shopify theme development, long-form product pages, CRO refinement
projects.summary: Shopify build focused on trust signals, craftsmanship storytelling, and conversion clarity.
projects.outcome: Improved engagement across high-consideration product pages.
